nodes.text: Blains Vorlin was a Human male diplomat who served as the ambassador of the Galactic Empire to the Corporate Sector Authority on Etti IV in the Corporate Sector.
Vorlin served alongside Davim Cross in the Diplomatic Corps before the Republic became the Empire. He also knew his wife.
In 3 BBY, he sent his aide Emesh Nar to meet Jahan Cross at Mondder Spaceport and invite him to a party at the embassy. At the party, he greeted Cross and told him to enjoy himself.
